description.narrative:
Stöd till Swedish Environment Institute (SEI) för etablering av Swedish Development Research Network (SweDev) som syftar till att stärka utvecklingsforskningen i Sverige och att öka relevansen av utvecklingsrelaterad forskning för att bidra till policyutveckling och beslutsfattande och svenska aktörers arbete med utvecklingsfrågor (Agenda 2030).
Stödet innefattar finansiering för att stödja etablering av nätverket och dess verksamhet ( grundläggande infrastruktur, aktiviteter och administration). SEI kommer att fungera som värd / sekretariat för nätverket och SweDev kommer att följa SEI: s financiella system och rutiner.

Support to Swedish Environment Institute (SEI) for the establishment of a Swedish Development Research Network (SweDev), which aims to strengthen development research in Sweden and to increase the relevance of evidence-based development research for efficient policy-making and practice among Swedish actors working for Agenda 2030.
The contribution includes support the setting-up of the network, both in terms of the basic infrastructure, activities and administration. SEI will function as a host/secretariat for the network. In legal terms SweDev is thus a project hosted by the SEI and will as such follow financial management procedures of SEI.

The purpose of SweDev is to strengthen links between development researchers based in Sweden as well as between development research, policy and practice. The network aims to strengthen the collaborations amongst development researchers in Sweden and to increase the relevance and use of development research for efficient policymaking and practice among Swedish actors working for the 2030 Agenda. To reach the overall objectives SweDev network seeks to:1. Improve multi-disciplinary connections and exploration of synergetic effects among Swedish development researchers2. Increase the use of research-based knowledge in policies and practices3. Strengthen the connections between development research, policy, and practice

tag.narrative: 9.5 - Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending.

9.5 - Förbättra forskningen och industrisektorernas tekniska kapacitet i alla länder, i synnerhet utvecklingsländerna, bland annat genom att till 2030 uppmuntra innovation och väsentligt öka det antal personer som arbetar med forskning och utveckling per 1 miljon människor liksom de offentliga och privata utgifterna för forskning och utveckling.
